entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
